titles.title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to establish a formula for allocating funds apportioned to the territories for the National Highway System among the territories.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Revises the formula for allocating funds apportioned to specified U.S. territories for the National Highway System to specify each territory's share of apportioned funds.
